edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common
Class LSPSource

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPObject
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPSource
public class LSPSource
extends LSPObject

Represents a "source", as defined in STARTS 1.0. A source is simply the name of the underlying subcollection being searched - another name for the BackEndLSP.

Description copied from class: LSPObject
Defines how an LSPObject can be represented in XML. The implementor of this method should write all XML to the XMLWriter that has been passed in.
